onActionViewCollapsed().Description: Called when this view is collapsed as an action view. See @B_android#view#MenuItem#collapseActionView_E@.

onActionViewExpanded().Description: Called when this view is expanded as an action view. See @B_android#view#MenuItem#expandActionView_E@.

ClassDesc: When a @B_android#view#View_E@ implements this interface it will receive callbacks when expanded or collapsed as an action view alongside the optional, app-specified callbacks to @B_android#view#MenuItem#OnActionExpandListener_E@. See @B_android#view#MenuItem_E@ for more information about action views. See @B_android#app#ActionBar_E@ for more information about the action bar.
